title: ~ 6 weeks free - Luxury studio with rooftop pool - East Austin
posting_body: Listed price is factoring in the special of 6-weeks free over a 15-month lease term.
🏠 This is a spacious and well laid out studio in a new East Austin community.
Walkable to Downtown, East 6th st, Rosewood, and Manor st.
~ Parking is an additional $85 a month in the gated and covered garage.
~ This is a very functional layout with tons of living room space.
This community has top of the line amenities; 4th floor pool deck as well as a rooftop pool, massive gym with indoor basketball court, dog run , dog washing station, lounge area near the pool.
This community is in East Austin only 7 mins to Lady Bird Lake, and easily walkable to downtown/east austin bars/breweries/ and dining.
😄 I'm a licensed Apartment locator and get paid by the properties so my service is 100% free.
I have been doing this job for over 5 years.
I love what I do and my goal is to make your apartment search as easy and smooth as possible.
Don't hesitate to text or call me and use my knowledge of Austin's market to assure you get a great deal on your next apartment.
